means: class ： 从"班级"引申指学生在一起上课，还可表示"(一节)课"。
lesson ： 主要指教材中的一课或每次授课的单位时间。
course ： 指在一段时间内教完或学完的完整的课程。

lj.lj_ls: 他一生中帮助过许多人。

lj.lj_ly: the car went careering off course.
he battled to keep the ship on course.
lj.lj_ls: 他拼命不让船偏离航道。

lj.lj_ly: to get back on course, I relied on one of my stock questions.
lj.lj_ls: 我借着一个老套的问题回到了正题。

jx.jx_en_mean: complete its natural development without interference
jx.jx_cn_mean: 自然而然地发展；按常规进行

lj.lj_ly: his illness had to run its course to the crisis.
lj.lj_ls: 他的病情势必每况愈下，越来越严重。

jx.jx_en_mean: At the proper or right time.
In the natural or expected order of things; naturally.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 自然地：按事物自然的或预期的顺序；自然地

entry.def: Course is often used in the expression 'of course', or instead of 'of course' in informal spoken English. See 见 of course .
entry.tran: 当然(在英语口语中常用于代替 of course)

entry.def: The course of a vehicle, especially a ship or aircraft, is the route along which it is travelling.
entry.tran: (尤指船或飞机的)航向，航线，路线

example.ex: Aircraft can avoid each other by going up and down, as well as by altering course to left or right...
example.tran: 飞机可以通过上下升降和左右移动改变航线来避免相撞。

example.ex: The tug was seaward of the Hakai Passage on a course that diverged from the Calvert Island coastline.
example.tran: 托船驶离卡尔弗特岛海岸朝哈凯航道驶去。

entry.def: A course of action is an action or a series of actions that you can do in a particular situation.

example.ex: My best course of action was to help Gill by being loyal, loving and endlessly sympathetic...
example.tran: 我能给吉尔的最大帮助就是对他忠诚、关爱他并且永远满怀同情之心。

example.ex: He must fall on his sword. That's the only course left open to him...
example.tran: 他必须面对失败，他唯有这一条路走。

entry.def: You can refer to the way that events develop as, for example, the course of history or the course of events .

example.ex: ...a series of decisive naval battles which altered the course of history...
example.tran: 改变历史进程的一系列决定性的海战

example.ex: In the natural course of events cows would wish to be milked more than twice a day...
example.tran: 按照事情发展的自然规律，母牛每天应该挤奶两次以上。

entry.def: A course is a series of lessons or lectures on a particular subject.

example.ex: ...a course in business administration...
example.tran: 企业管理课程

example.ex: I'm shortly to begin a course on the modern novel.
example.tran: 我不久将要选修一门现代小说课程。

entry.def: A course of medical treatment is a series of treatments that a doctor gives someone.

example.ex: Treatment is supplemented with a course of antibiotics to kill the bacterium...
example.tran: 治疗期间辅以一个疗程的抗生素注射来杀灭细菌。

example.ex: She went to her doctor, who offered to put her on a course of tranquillizers.
example.tran: 她去看医生，医生建议她服用一个疗程的镇静剂。

entry.def: A course is one part of a meal.

example.ex: The lunch was excellent, especially the first course.
example.tran: 午餐很棒，尤其是第一道菜。

example.ex: ...a three-course dinner.
example.tran: 有3道菜的晚餐

entry.def: In sport, a course is an area of land where races are held or golf is played, or the land over which a race takes place.

example.ex: Only 12 seconds separated the first three riders on the Bickerstaffe course...
example.tran: 比科斯达夫赛场上的前3名骑手之间只差12秒。

example.ex: In July comes the Tour de France, when 200 cyclists cover a course of 2,000 miles.
example.tran: 7月份迎来了环法自行车赛，200名自行车选手要骑行2,000英里的赛程。

entry.def: The course of a river is the channel along which it flows.

example.ex: Romantic chateaux and castles overlook the river's twisting course.
example.tran: 富有浪漫气息的庄园和城堡俯瞰着蜿蜒的河道。

entry.def: If a liquid courses somewhere, it flows quickly.

example.ex: The tears coursed down his cheeks...
example.tran: 他泪如雨下。

example.ex: When you're sitting still, you need less blood coursing through your arteries.
example.tran: 静坐时动脉血液流动较缓。

entry.def: If something happens in the course of a particular period of time, it happens during that period of time.

example.ex: In the course of the 1930s steel production in Britain approximately doubled...
example.tran: 在20世纪30年代，英国的钢铁产量几乎翻了一番。

example.ex: We struck up a conversation, in the course of which it emerged that he was a sailing man.
example.tran: 我们聊了起来，在谈话过程中得知他是一名水手。

entry.def: If you do something as a matter of course, you do it as part of your normal work or way of life.

example.ex: If police are carrying arms as a matter of course then doesn't it encourage criminals to carry them?
example.tran: 如果警察每天理所当然地携带武器，这难道不会促使罪犯也持械吗？

entry.def: If a ship or aircraft is on course, it is travelling along the correct route. If it is off course, it is no longer travelling along the correct route.
entry.tran: 在正确航道(或航线)上/偏离航道(或航线)

example.ex: The ill fated ship was sent off course into shallow waters and rammed by another vessel.
example.tran: 这艘倒霉的船偏离航道误入浅水区，被另外一艘船撞上了。

entry.def: If you are on course for something, you are likely to achieve it.

example.ex: England are well on course for a place at the World Cup Finals...
example.tran: 英格兰队很有可能打进世界杯决赛。

example.ex: The company is on course for profits of £20m in the next financial year.
example.tran: 该公司有望在下一个财年实现2,000万英镑的盈利。

entry.def: If something runs its course or takes its course, it develops naturally and comes to a natural end.

example.ex: They estimated that between 17,000 and 20,000 cows would die before the epidemic had run its course...
example.tran: 他们估计在流行病结束之前会有17,000到20,000头牛死去。

example.ex: As for the imprisoned leaders, he asserted that justice would have to take its course.
example.tran: 他坚称必须对监禁的领导人依法审判。

entry.def: If you stay the course, you finish something that you have started, even though it has become very difficult.

example.ex: The oldest president in American history had stayed the course for two terms.
example.tran: 美国历史上的第一位总统连任两届。

entry.def: If something changes or becomes true in the course of time, it changes or becomes true over a long period of time.

example.ex: In the course of time, many of their myths become entangled.
example.tran: 最后，他们很多荒诞的说法都变得错综复杂了。

means.word_mean: 1. education imparted in a series of lessons or class meetings;

sentences.sentence: "he took a course in basket weaving"
"flirting is not unknown in college classes"

means.word_mean: 2. a connected series of events or actions or developments;

sentences.sentence: "historians can only point out those lines for which evidence is available"

means.word_mean: 3. facility consisting of a circumscribed area of land or water laid out for a sport;

sentences.sentence: "the course was less than a mile"
"if you persist in that course you will surely fail"
"once a nation is embarked on a course of action it becomes extremely difficult for any retraction to take place"

means.word_mean: 5. a line or route along which something travels or moves;

sentences.sentence: "the hurricane demolished houses in its path"

means.word_mean: 7. part of a meal served at one time;

sentences.sentence: "naturally, the lawyer sent us a huge bill"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French cours, from Latin cursus, from curs- 'run', from the verb currere

sentences.cn: 我不久将要选修一门现代小说课程。
sentences.en: I'm shortly to begin a course on the modern novel.

sentences.cn: 不幸的是，洛杉矶联合学区制定了一项不可更改的政策，该政策强制规定除了一些高级课程外，家庭作业在学生学习成绩中所占的比重不再超过10%。
sentences.en: Unfortunately, L.A.nUnified has produced an inflexible policy which mandates that with the exception of some advanced courses, homework may no longer count for more than 10% of a student's academic grade.

sentences.cn: 卡内基梅隆大学计算机科学学院副院长汤姆科尔蒂纳指出，毫无经验的学生在学完一些入门课程之后就能赶上进度。
sentences.en: Students without experience can catch up after a few .introductory courses, said Tom Cortina, the assistant dean at Carnegie Mellon's  School of Computer Science

sentences.cn: 据公司创始人RichardRusczyk 说，去年参加了国际奥数竞赛的六名美国队队员一共在该网站上了40 多门课程。
sentences.en: According to Richard Rusczyk, the company founder, the six U.S. team members who competed at the IMO last year collectively took more than 40 courses on the site.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 你们为什么要考虑在大学选一门人口学课程呢？各位可能成长在当初婴儿潮那一代人即将退休甚至过世的时代。
sentences.en: Why should you consider taking a course in demography in college? You’ll be growing up in a generation where the baby boomers are going into retirement and dying.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 和挂牌名称不同的是，这个中心就是一个为课堂和线上课程所涉及的技术应用所准备的信息交流中心。
sentences.en: Contrary to its title, the center is a clearing house ( 信息交流中心) for using technology in classrooms and in online courses.
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 教师一定要能以自己的方式自由地教课——课程安排应足够灵活，让教师可以发挥个人才华来实现课程目标。
sentences.en: The teachers must be free to teach in their own way— the curriculum should be flexible enough so that they can use their individual talents to achieve the goals of the course.
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 第一个决定就是选择课程。
sentences.en: The  first  decision  is  your choice  of  course.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 它像一门课程，但是事实上，你只是有一个课程带头人，类似于指导员之类的，且会帮你解决问题。
sentences.en: It’s  like  a  course,  but  really,  you  just  have  a  course  leader,  who’s  there  sort  of  as  a  coaching  guide  and  to  help  out
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 你可以报名学习我们任何在线课程.
sentences.en: You can enroll for any of our courses online.

sentences.cn: 此课程即项目中的一个组成部分.
sentences.en: This course is part of the abovementioned Programme.

sentences.cn: 这些课程为职业训练做准备.
sentences.en: These courses will be a preparation for the professional training.

sentences.cn: 本课程使用电脑辅助设计法则来合成多变数回授控制系统.
sentences.en: This course uses computer aided design methodologies for synthesis of multivariable feedback control systems.

sentences.cn: 你希望从这课程中得到什麽?
sentences.en: What do you hope to achieve by doing this course?

sentences.cn: 本课程介绍地球海洋和大气层中扰流的现象 、 理论和模型.
sentences.en: This course presents the phenomena, theory, and modeling of turbulence the Earth's oceans and atmosphere.

sentences.cn: 课程包括整套的课堂讲稿和研习数据.
sentences.en: This course features a full set of lecture notes and study materials.

sentences.cn: 对于学习不感兴趣的学生将被提供一些特别的课程.
sentences.en: The students who no interest in studies will be offered some special courses.

sentences.cn: 结果学生成了被动又感到无聊的旁观者, 他们不再动脑思考,只是敷衍了事地修完课程.
sentences.en: Left as passive, bored spectators, students withdraw intellectually and simply the motions necessary to the course.

sentences.cn: 她对这门课程感到厌倦.
sentences.en: The course palled on her.

sentences.cn: 我们的课程将能把你的英语水平提高到相对应的雅思等级.
sentences.en: Our courses will bring your English to a level equal to IELTs scores.

sentences.cn: 期末专题将会和课程中其他的活动有关联性.
sentences.en: The Final Project will bring together all the other activities in the course.

sentences.cn: 课程教授角色设计基础知识,即为游戏及动画片创作富有想象力的,有趣的角色.
sentences.en: This course teaches the fundamentals of creating imaginative and interesting characters for all gaming and animation.

sentences.cn: 理科课程近年来普及很快.
sentences.en: The spread of science courses has been rapid in recent years.

sentences.cn: 一般情况下,获得 文学士 或理学士学位需要花4年时间才能完成课程的学习.
sentences.en: Normally B . A . or B . S . degree course work can be completed in four years.
sentences.from: 无师自通 校园英语会话

sentences.cn: 他们确定了去群岛的航线。
sentences.en: They set a course for the islands.

sentences.cn: 飞机可以通过上下升降和左右移动改变航线来避免相撞。
sentences.en: Aircraft can avoid each other by going up and down, as well as by altering course to left or right...

sentences.cn: 缩成皱纹的,小园齿状的, 它们的航线上, 下, 和穿过犹他州.
sentences.en: Corrugated , crenulated, they course up, down, and across Utah.

sentences.cn: 但是我们坠毁在航线的一千里以外.
sentences.en: But we crashed a thousand miles off course.

sentences.cn: 猛烈的风, 汹涌的浪, 曾造成许多船只偏离航线,撞到礁石上.
sentences.en: High winds, rough seas, have carried away many ships off course onto the rocky coast.

sentences.cn: 由于天气恶劣;飞机不得不更改航线.
sentences.en: Owing to bad weather the plane had to change its course.

sentences.cn: 你在第二轮第一迎风段的航线太棒了.
sentences.en: You had a perfect course on the first beat, race 2.

sentences.cn: 在航行中,你必须走一条迂回的航线.
sentences.en: You must take an indirect course in sailing.

sentences.cn: 船要偏离航线了, 我们得转向迎风行驶.
sentences.en: The boat's going off course, we'll have to haul up.

sentences.cn: 由于天气反常,那艘船在比赛中被吹离了航线.
sentences.en: The ship was blown off course by abnormal weather conditions during the race.

sentences.cn: 飞机飞行偏离了航线.
sentences.en: The plane flew off the course.

sentences.cn: 这艘船改变了航线.
sentences.en: The ship has altered its course.

sentences.cn: 目前, 至远东 、 东南亚及印度次大陆全水路航线已达24条.
sentences.en: Current, to far east, southeast Asia and Indian subcontinent complete canalage course already amounted to 24.

sentences.cn: 舰长下令将船的航线用圆规测绘出来.
sentences.en: The captain ordered the ship's course to be pricked up.

sentences.cn: 由于天气恶劣,飞机不得不更改航线.
sentences.en: Owing to weather the plane had to change its course.

sentences.cn: 船长标示出船的航线并让船员们做好准备.
sentences.en: The captain plotted the ship's course and told the crew to get ready.

sentences.cn: 美国: 为了避免发生碰撞,建议调整你们的航线,方位角北15度.
sentences.en: AMERICANS: Recommend you divert your course 15 degrees to the north to avoid a collision.

sentences.cn: 航线偏离指示 ( CDI ) 位于中央显示器的上半部.
sentences.en: CDI Mode . The Course Deviation Indicator ( CDI ) is the top half of the center display.

sentences.cn: 只要不时用个手指去碰一碰舵轮,她就会整天按照航线行驶.
sentences.en: She would hold her course all day, with a finger to the wheel now and again.

sentences.cn: 我们沿着这条航线行驶到下午时分, 然后向东驶.
sentences.en: We followed the course until well into the afternoon, then we bore off to the eastward.

sentences.cn: 在暴风雨中, 船驶离了航线.
sentences.en: During the storm, the ship off course.

sentences.cn: 轮船的航线是标在航海图上的.
sentences.en: The course of a ship is marked on a chart.

sentences.cn: 他们在吹这种风的情况下,换成逆帆来保持既定航线.
sentences.en: They laid the sails aback to stay on course in that wind.

sentences.cn: 公司航线优势明显.
sentences.en: Company's course advantage is obvious.

sentences.cn: 改航线的构成能满足竞赛管理的需要 吗 ?
sentences.en: Does the course configuration assist with efficient race management?

sentences.cn: 不久前,有架轻便客机飞出了航线, 在山区坠落了,飞行员丧生了.
sentences.en: When a light passenger plane flew off course some time ago, it crashed in the mountains and its pilot was killed.
